business.headline: How to make the most of your Diwali bonus and build long-term wealthTurn your Diwali bonus into a stepping stone for long-term financial security with these expert-backed tips.

Gold hits Rs 1.30 lakh again, silver at Rs 1.58 lakh: Buy now or wait for a dip?Gold and silver are regaining momentum amid festive demand and global uncertainty. Investors should buy with discipline, stagger purchases, and treat bullion as a long-term hedge rather than chasing short-term spikes.

Muhurat Trading today: Your quick guide to today's one-hour special sessionAs Muhurat Trading 2025 begins this afternoon, optimism runs high on Dalal Street. With Nifty near record highs and liquidity improving, experts suggest discipline, stock selection, and long-term focus.

Sensex, Nifty end higher on Diwali as Reliance, bank stocks shineThe BSE Sensex rose 0.5% to 84,363.37, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 0.49% to 25,851—both hitting fresh one-year highs. Over the past four sessions, the indices have climbed 2.8%, leaving them less than 2% away from their all-time highs scaled in September 2024.

China files WTO complaint against India over EV subsidies and batteriesThe Chinese Commerce Ministry has alleged that the measures by India violate several WTO obligations, including the principle of national treatment, and constitute import substitution subsidies, which are explicitly prohibited under the multi-lateral trade rules.

Muhurat Trading on October 21: Check timing, trade strategy and moreMuhurat Trading will take place on October 21 this year. The pre-open session will run from 1:30 pm to 1:45 pm, followed by the main trading window from 1:45 pm to 2:45 pm, and a closing session until 3:05 pm.

Reliance shares jump 3% after Q2 results. Should it be in your Diwali portfolio?Around 10:20 am, shares of Reliance Industries rose 3.22% to Rs 1,462.60 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). The stock's sharp upmove added to the broader market rally on Dalal Street as sentiment turned upbeat following a string of solid earnings reports.

Diwali cheer on Dalal Street as Sensex jumps nearly 700 pointsAt around 9:23 am, the S&P BSE Sensex jumped 673.90 points to 84,626.09, while the NSE Nifty50 surged 202.50 points to 25,912.35. Broader market indices also witnessed sharp gains, and volatility dropped, indicating strong investor confidence.

Silver prices fall after Diwali buying. Is it still a good bet?Silver has surged nearly 98% in a year, breaching Rs 2 lakh/kg in parts of India before a post-Diwali dip. But is investing in the precious metal still a good bet? With industrial demand booming and supply tightening, reports suggest silver's shine might just be getting started.

EU to hold urgent talks on European industries hit by China's rare earth curbsChina, the world's leading producer of the minerals used to make magnets crucial to the auto, electronics and defence industries, this month announced new controls on the export of rare-earth technologies.

PM's Diwali gift delivered: Nirmala Sitharaman presents GST 2.0 report cardGST Bachat Utsav: Sitharaman, addressing a press conference along with ministers Piyush Goyal and Ashwini Vaishnaw ahead of Diwali, said the GST rate cuts resulted in bumper sales of cars and electronics.

Gold prices near record high on Dhanteras: Should you buy?Gold prices have been on a relentless rally, hitting new record highs almost every day. But does this glittering streak make it the right fit for your investment portfolio this Dhanteras?

Gold flashing a big warning signal: Zoho's Sridhar Vembu says amid rising pricesAs gold prices soar globally, Zoho's Sridhar Vembu raises a red flag. Does the surge signal investor anxiety and eroding trust in the system or reveal a deeper economic fault line?

Gold prices hit record high ahead of Dhanteras, see Rs 3,200 hike in DelhiTraders said gold buying activity picked up sharply as stockists built fresh positions on expectations of higher sales during the festive season.

Why silver utensils, not coins, could help make more moneyWith the price of silver at a record high, silverware might be a potential tax-saving alternative to bars and coins. Personal-use silver utensils are exempt from capital gains tax when sold. Here's what chartered accountants have to say about silver utensils helping investors save on taxes.
Sensex ends 484 points higher, Nifty above 25,700; Asian Paints jumps 4%The S&P BSE Sensex settled 484.53 points higher at 83,952.19, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 124.55 points to close at 25,709.85.

Diwali 2025: From ETFs to SGBs, 5 smart ways to invest in goldWith gold prices at record levels this Diwali, many people are rethinking whether to buy jewellery or look at smarter investment routes. From gold ETFs to SGBs, there are safer and more practical ways to invest without worrying about storage or high-making charges.

Coca-Cola eyes $1 billion IPO for Indian bottling arm: ReportThe discussions are still in early stages, and Coca-Cola has not yet appointed bankers for the deal. The listing could take place as early as next year, though details such as timing, structure, and offer size are still being worked out, the report said.

Why keeping all your money in saving account may be a costly mistake, explains CAMany people believe that money parked in a savings account is the safest option. But an expert warns that this habit could quietly drain your wealth over time, especially when inflation eats into low returns.

entertainment.headline: BB19 episode 56: Farrhana-Malti clash, Altaf Raja's concert lights up the house Farhana and Malti's ongoing verbal clashes dominated today's 'Bigg Boss' episode, with tensions rising over personal comments and alliances. Amid the drama, the house enjoyed a soulful live performance by Altaf Raja.

Kriti Sanon, Kabir Bahia's Diwali celebration fuel dating rumours. See photos Actor Kriti Sanon and her rumoured partner and businessman Kabir Bahia celebrated Diwali together. Their photos from the celebration at Kriti's home caught the attention of fans online, sparking further interest.

Lakshya joins Tiger Shroff in Dharma's new revenge drama: Report Lakshya has reportedly signed a new Dharma Productions film following the success of 'The Ba***ds of Bollywood'. The project is expected to feature a face-off with Tiger Shroff and will be directed by Raj Mehta, not Karan Johar.

Late actor Asrani's final films Bhooth Bangla and Haiwaan to release in 2026 Late actor Govardhan Asrani will appear in 'Bhooth Bangla' and 'Haiwaan' after his death. Both films are directed by Priyadarshan and will be released in 2026.

Sunita Ahuja panics after losing her engagement ring, talks about bond with Govinda Sunita Ahuja shared in her vlog that she lost her engagement solitaire gifted by Govinda but later found it safely in her bag after praying at the Mumba Devi Temple. During her visit, she expressed deep love for her husband, dismissing ongoing rumours of their separation.

Chiranjeevi celebrates Diwali with Nagarjuna, Nayanthara and Venkatesh. Viral pics Chiranjeevi hosted a Diwali celebration in Hyderabad, attended by Nagarjuna, Nayanthara, and Venkatesh and their families. The gathering was shared on social media, featuring moments of camaraderie among the stars.

Kiara-Sidharth celebrate 1st Diwali as parents, fans can't get enough of their glow Kiara Advani made her first public appearance after the birth of her baby girl, celebrating Diwali with husband Sidharth Malhotra in a joyful video shared online. The couple's happiness and festive greetings won the hearts of fans as they marked their first Diwali as parents.

Parineeti Chopra and Raghav Chadha thank fans for love after welcoming baby boy Parineeti Chopra and Raghav Chadha welcomed their baby boy on October 19, receiving immense love and blessings from fans. Expressing gratitude, Parineeti shared a heartfelt note thanking everyone for their warm wishes and support.

PM Modi mourns veteran actor Asrani's death: Gifted entertainer, truly versatile Veteran actor Asrani, famed for his legendary comic timing, died at 84 in Mumbai. PM Modi, Amit Shah, and Bollywood stars paid tribute, celebrating his enduring legacy and the laughter he brought to generations.

Saiyaara's Aneet Padda joins horror-comedy universe with Shakti Shalini Aneet Padda of 'Saiyaara' fame has been officially announced as the lead actor in Maddock Films' upcoming horror comedy 'Shakti Shalini'. The film's release is now scheduled for December 24, 2026, following a video announcement attached to 'Thamma'.

Vijay Deverakonda's Diwali post has fans convinced Rashmika Mandanna was there Vijay Deverakonda's Diwali celebration videos have fans convinced Rashmika Mandanna was present. The couple's engagement rumours and possible February wedding add excitement to the speculation.

Rajinikanth's Diwali 2025 was all about spending time with daughters, grandchildren Superstar Rajinikanth celebrated Diwali at home with his daughters, wife, and grandchildren. Family photos shared by Soundarya Rajinikanth highlight the low-key gathering.

Shah Rukh Khan shares glimpse of Diwali celebration with wife Gauri's pic Shah Rukh Khan shared Diwali greetings with Gauri Khan's puja photo as he opted for a quiet family celebration this year. Fans reacted warmly to the photo.

Akshay Kumar, Rajpal Yadav pay moving tributes as veteran actor Asrani dies at 84 Bollywood is deeply saddened by the death of veteran actor Asrani, who died at 84 after a long illness, leaving behind a rich legacy of laughter. Tributes from stars like Akshay Kumar and Rajpal Yadav highlight his unmatched comic timing and the warmth he brought to the film industry.
Samantha celebrates Diwali with Raj Nidimoru and family, festive pics surface Samantha Ruth Prabhu shared festive Diwali moments with filmmaker Raj Nidimoru, fuelling romance rumours.

Bison Kaalamaadan takes us back to Mari Selvaraj's universe of caste atrocity Caste commentary in 'Bison' comes alive through raw imagery, besides symbolism pertaining to food, hunger, and animal imagery. The film, directed by Mari Selvaraj, features Dhruv Vikram, Pasupathy and Ameer in pivotal roles.

Hulu revives Prison Break with a bold new twist and Emily Browning in the lead Hulu has greenlit a new 'Prison Break' series, promising the same edge-of-your-seat thrill with an all-new cast and storyline. Led by Emily Browning and helmed by Elgin James, the reboot dives into loyalty and survival inside one of America's deadliest prisons, reimagining the iconic franchise for a new generation.

Keira Knightley recalls paparazzi abuse at 18: Called me whore to provoke reaction Keira Knightley has opened up about the dark side of fame, recalling how paparazzi harassment and constant stalking took a toll on her mental health.

Actor Colman Domingo joins Wicked: For Good cast as the Cowardly Lion Oscar-nominated actor Colman Domingo has been cast as the Cowardly Lion in 'Wicked: For Good', the eagerly awaited sequel to 'Wicked'. The film promises to deepen the magical world of Oz with familiar faces and new adventures, releasing in theatres on November 21.

general news.headline: Mahagathbandhan vs Mahagathbandhan in 11 Bihar seats, Chirag Paswan takes a jabBihar polls: The disarray in the opposition ranks, coming a fortnight before the first phase of the Bihar polls, has invited jabs from the NDA and Chirag Paswan.

Damage control? Kiran Shaw, DK Shivakumar meet amid Bengaluru infra criticism rowKiran Mazumdar-Shaw met Karnataka Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar at his residence. Sources said they discussed her criticism of Bengaluru's poor roads and garbage issues. Shivakumar reportedly assured her that the grievances would be addressed promptly

US clarifies on H-1B visa fee, big relief for students, techiesThe Donald Trump administration has clarified exemptions to the controversial $100,000 H-1B visa fee introduced via a presidential proclamation in September. Employers can now proceed with change-of-status filings. The proclamation's scope is limited to new petitions for individuals outside the country.

Delhi's 'green' Diwali goes up in smoke as air quality turns severeDelhi-NCR AQI: The average air quality index (AQI) in the national capital stood at 451 – 1.8x above the national average – as pollution levels worsened a day after Diwali celebrations.

Zohran Mamdani's photo with imam tied to 1993 bombing piques Trump, MuskNew York's mayoral front-runner Zohran Mamdani was seen smiling and standing hand-in-hand with imam Siraj Wahhaj, believed to be a co-conspirator in the 1993 World Trade Centre bombing.

No Diwali bonus, no toll: Agra-Lucknow Expressway workers let vehicles pass freeSeveral vehicles passed through the Fatehabad toll on the Agra-Lucknow Expressway without paying tolls after employees, upset over the Diwali bonus, opened the gates. The incident disrupted traffic and prompted police intervention.

BJP MP purifies Pune fort with gaumutra after namaz video goes viralIn response to the namaz viral video, BJP workers led by Rajya Sabha MP Medha Kulkarni protested at the site and performed a "purification ritual" by sprinkling cow urine and dung at the spot where the prayers were said to have taken place.

Not just paneer, India has an egg problem as wellIndia has an egg problem. It is also a problem that mirrors our problem of low-quality and adulterated food, particularly on quick commerce apps where prices are high and yet quality is missing.

Your mom did: Karoline Leavitt snaps at reporter over question on Trump-Putin meetWhite House press secretary Karoline Leavitt criticised a Huffington Post reporter during a heated exchange over the Trump-Putin summit location.

Lokpal wants to acquire 7 luxury BMW cars, floats public tenderAs per sources, the total cost for all seven vehicles is expected to exceed Rs 5 crore and once the cars are delivered, BMW will provide at least seven days of training to the Lokpal's drivers and staff.

Gold hits Rs 1.30 lakh again, silver at Rs 1.58 lakh: Buy now or wait for a dip?Gold and silver are regaining momentum amid festive demand and global uncertainty. Investors should buy with discipline, stagger purchases, and treat bullion as a long-term hedge rather than chasing short-term spikes.

Delhi sweet shop owner calls Rahul Gandhi most eligible bachelor. Then, a requestThe owner of the iconic Ghantewala sweet shop in Old Delhi termed Rahul Gandhi as India's "most eligible bachelor" and joked that he should marry soon, so the shop can get the wedding sweets order.

Bengal man claims Swiggy delivered chicken instead of vegetarian meal on DiwaliIn a now-viral post on LinkedIn, a man from Bengal narrated what he called a deeply distressing incident involving a food delivery on Diwali.

AWS outage takes down most of the internet. Here is what really happenedOn Monday, a major outage at Amazon Web Services (AWS) shook the internet. Popular apps such as Reddit and Snapchat stopped working for users. The impact was felt not only by social media platforms but even banking apps and airline services were hampered. Let's understand what really happened at AWS.

Japan's Parliament elects Sanae Takaichi as country's 1st woman Prime MinisterSanae Takaichi, 64, will present a Cabinet with a number of allies of LDP's most powerful kingmaker, Taro Aso, and others who backed her in the party leadership vote.

Scientists design universal kidney to match any blood typeIn the first human test, an enzyme-converted kidney was transplanted into a brain-dead recipient with family consent, enabling scientists to safely study the body's reaction.

Vijay Deverakonda's Diwali post has fans convinced Rashmika Mandanna was thereVijay Deverakonda's Diwali celebration videos have fans convinced Rashmika Mandanna was present. The couple's engagement rumours and possible February wedding add excitement to the speculation.

Bharat avenged injustice through Op Sindoor: PM to nation in letter on DiwaliIn his letter, PM Modi hailed Operation Sindoor and the eradication of Naxalism as major achievements, urging citizens to embrace swadeshi, health, and yoga. He highlighted reforms like GST savings and called for lighting lamps of harmony and positivity this Diwali.

Pant back, to captain India A in four-day matches before South Africa TestsRishabh Pant will captain India A in two four-day matches against South Africa A before a Test series against the Proteas in November. Test specialists, including KL Rahul, Mohammed Siraj and Dhruv Jurel, will feature in the second four-day match, which will be played at BCCI Centre of Excellence in Bengaluru.

Toyota Land Cruiser FJ unveiled: Compact off-roader to make global debut in 2026Toyota has unveiled the all-new Land Cruiser FJ, a compact, rugged SUV combining classic Land Cruiser toughness with modern design.

Germany's pet parking pads are going viral. Is India ready to follow?Germany's pet parking pads are going viral and making pet lovers proud, but the big question is, could something like this actually work in India, too?

EU may classify ethanol as cancer-causing, threatening hand sanitisers: ReportIn April this year, the EU began reviewing ethanol, a chemical best known as the key ingredient in alcoholic beverages, over concerns about potential health risks. This time, the focus is on ethanol's use as a disinfectant rather than as a drink.

Man, 26, tied, beaten to death after being mistaken for thief in MumbaiAs per reports, Harshal Parma's hands and legs were tied, after which he was severely assaulted. Goregaon police have registered a case and arrested four individuals in connection with the incident.

Ex-Google CEO's former girlfriend accuses him of abuse, surveillance: ReportMichelle Ritter, who reportedly had an on-and-off relationship with Schmidt while he remained married to his wife Wendy, filed for a temporary restraining order against the 70-year-old billionaire late last year.

Kriti Sanon, Kabir Bahia's Diwali celebration fuel dating rumours. See photosActor Kriti Sanon and her rumoured partner and businessman Kabir Bahia celebrated Diwali together. Their photos from the celebration at Kriti's home caught the attention of fans online, sparking further interest.

Lakshya joins Tiger Shroff in Dharma's new revenge drama: ReportLakshya has reportedly signed a new Dharma Productions film following the success of 'The Ba***ds of Bollywood'. The project is expected to feature a face-off with Tiger Shroff and will be directed by Raj Mehta, not Karan Johar.

sports.headline: Ro-Ko legacy will remain regardless of when they retire from game: Ravi Shastri Ravi Shastri said that Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma's legacy will always remain irrespective of when they decide to retire from the game. Kohli and Rohit's future has been a question of debate with the 2027 ODI World Cup on the horizon.

Pant back, to captain India A in four-day matches before South Africa Tests Rishabh Pant will captain India A in two four-day matches against South Africa A before a Test series against the Proteas in November. Test specialists, including KL Rahul, Mohammed Siraj and Dhruv Jurel, will feature in the second four-day match, which will be played at BCCI Centre of Excellence in Bengaluru.

Demons of BGT 2024-25 still haunting Virat Kohli: Irfan Pathan India vs Australia: Both Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma failed in their return to international cricket. After the 1st ODI, former cricketer Irfan Pathan stated the obvious - the demons of BGT are still haunting the senior duo.

Don't write off champions: Aussie great backs Kohli, Rohit for 2027 World Cup India tour of Australia: Former Australia captain Ricky Ponting has backed both Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma to feature in the 2027 World Cup. The legendary batters endured a disappointing return to international cricket as India's batting line-up collapsed in the series opener in Perth on Sunday, 19 October.

The key piece of advice that changed Labuschagne's fortunes ahead of Ashes Marnus Labuschagne has made a compelling case for a Test recall, hitting 4 hundreds in his last 5 Sheffield Shield games. What led to this sudden change in form after a prolonged lean patch in Test cricket?

IND vs AUS: For how long can Kuldeep Yadav put on a brave face? Spinner Kuldeep Yadav was not picked in the playing XI for the team's first ODI against Australia. Kuldeep, despite being carried for the majority of the series, has not been the preferred choice of the Gambhir management.

India travel to Adelaide on Diwali, fans shower love with Rohit-Kohli chants Indian cricket fans created a festive scene at Adelaide airport, singing chants for Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli as the team arrived ahead of the second ODI. The team, led by Shubman Gill, looks to recover from their loss in Perth.

Season of light and the problem of 80 per cent commitment As the country celebrates Diwali, there will be no gala dinner for India's women's team — only a search for fire and belief ahead of their clash with New Zealand.

Shaheen Afridi replaces Mohammad Rizwan as Pakistan's new ODI captain Shaheen Afridi has been named Pakistan's new ODI captain, replacing Mohammad Rizwan. He will lead the team in the upcoming series against South Africa starting November 4.

Bangladesh implode in dramatic last-over thriller as Sri Lanka keep semis hopes alive Chamari Athapaththu's brilliant final over secured a narrow seven-run victory for Sri Lanka over Bangladesh. The win keeps Sri Lanka's semi-final hopes alive but leaves Bangladesh rueing missed chances.

IND vs AUS: For how long can Kuldeep Yadav put on a brave face? Spinner Kuldeep Yadav was not picked in the playing XI for the team's first ODI against Australia. Kuldeep, despite being carried for the majority of the series, has not been the preferred choice of the Gambhir management.

India travel to Adelaide on Diwali, fans shower love with Rohit-Kohli chants Indian cricket fans created a festive scene at Adelaide airport, singing chants for Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli as the team arrived ahead of the second ODI. The team, led by Shubman Gill, looks to recover from their loss in Perth.

Season of light and the problem of 80 per cent commitment As the country celebrates Diwali, there will be no gala dinner for India's women's team — only a search for fire and belief ahead of their clash with New Zealand.

Shaheen Afridi replaces Mohammad Rizwan as Pakistan's new ODI captain Shaheen Afridi has been named Pakistan's new ODI captain, replacing Mohammad Rizwan. He will lead the team in the upcoming series against South Africa starting November 4.

Bangladesh implode in dramatic last-over thriller as Sri Lanka keep semis hopes alive Chamari Athapaththu's brilliant final over secured a narrow seven-run victory for Sri Lanka over Bangladesh. The win keeps Sri Lanka's semi-final hopes alive but leaves Bangladesh rueing missed chances.

Manolo Marquez urges FC Goa fans to stay realistic about Al Nassr clashManolo Marquez has called for patience and perspective from FC Goa fans ahead of their clash with Al Nassr. The Spaniard reminded supporters that facing the Saudi heavyweights is far from an ordinary game.

After missing India tour, West Indies' Shamar Joseph ruled out of Bangladesh seriesWest Indies pace bowlers Shamar Joseph and Jediah Blades are ruled out of the Bangladesh ODI series due to injuries. The team brings in Akeal Hosein and Ramon Simmonds as reinforcements amid concerns over player fitness.

R Ashwin urges BCCI to practice player-selector clarity after Shami rowRavichandran Ashwin has called on the BCCI to improve clarity between players and selectors. He highlighted Mohammed Shami's recent ODI snub as an example of how indirect communication can create confusion.

Barcelona's Hansi Flick admits club changed him after emotional outburst against GironaBarcelona manager Hansi Flick has opened up on how his time at the club has changed him emotionally. The team faces a tough Champions League match with many key players sidelined due to injuries.

England captain Harry Brook completes 1000 T20I runs after New Zealand blitzEngland captain Harry Brook reached 1000 T20I runs with a spectacular 78 off 35 balls against New Zealand. His innings highlighted fearless strokeplay and leadership, cementing his place among England's elite T20I run-scorers.

Jurgen Klopp cites Manchester United's attitude as reason for rejecting manager roleJurgen Klopp has revealed why he turned down Manchester United, citing issues with the club's attitude and approach. He chose to wait for a project aligned with his philosophy, ultimately finding success with Liverpool.

Shan Masood anchors Pakistan on Day 1 as South Africa rue missed chances in RawalpindiPakistan reached 259 for five at stumps on day one of the second Test in Rawalpindi, with captain Shan Masood leading from the front. South Africa missed several fielding opportunities, putting themselves under pressure as Pakistan set a solid platform.

Navjot Sidhu denies fake quote on Gambhir's sacking, Rohit Sharma's captaincy returnFormer India cricketer Navjot Singh Sidhu has issued a strong denial after a fabricated quote regarding the 2027 ODI World Cup went viral on social media. The incident comes amid renewed attention on the Indian cricket team following the return of Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli to international play.

His innings highlighted fearless strokeplay and leadership, cementing his place among England's elite T20I run-scorers.

Jurgen Klopp cites Manchester United's attitude as reason for rejecting manager roleJurgen Klopp has revealed why he turned down Manchester United, citing issues with the club's attitude and approach. He chose to wait for a project aligned with his philosophy, ultimately finding success with Liverpool.

Shan Masood anchors Pakistan on Day 1 as South Africa rue missed chances in RawalpindiPakistan reached 259 for five at stumps on day one of the second Test in Rawalpindi, with captain Shan Masood leading from the front. South Africa missed several fielding opportunities, putting themselves under pressure as Pakistan set a solid platform.

Navjot Sidhu denies fake quote on Gambhir's sacking, Rohit Sharma's captaincy returnFormer India cricketer Navjot Singh Sidhu has issued a strong denial after a fabricated quote regarding the 2027 ODI World Cup went viral on social media. The incident comes amid renewed attention on the Indian cricket team following the return of Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli to international play.

Maguire was a meme, bullied: Rooney backs England defender for World CupWayne Rooney heaped praise on Harry Maguire and claimed that the defender should be a part of England's squad for the World Cup 2026. Maguire scored the winner for Manchester United in their 2-1 win over Liverpool.

Salt, Brook and Rashid star as England thump New Zealand in 2nd T20I by 65 runsPhil Salt and Harry Brook's heroics with the bat and Adil Rashid's brilliant spell helped England secure a 65-run win over New Zealand in the second T20I. New Zealand's decision to bowl first came back to hurt them.

Do Indian women's cricket team get paid same as the men's team? Know real truthThe BCCI (Board of Control for Cricket in India) is the richest cricket board in the world. As BCCI earns year-round through broadcast and sponsorship deals and the IPL, the benefits also spread to the players representing India. However, are the men and women paid equally?

Cristiano Ronaldo snubs India trip for FC Goa clash despite repeated club requestsCristiano Ronaldo has decided not to travel to India for Al-Nassr's AFC Champions League 2 clash against FC Goa, disappointing fans who had hoped to see both Ronaldo and Lionel Messi play in India this year.

Weeks after West Ham United sacking, Graham Potter appointed Sweden coachWeeks after being sacked by West Ham United, Graham Potter took charge of Sweden's national team on Monday, October 20. Potter will aim to revive Sweden's World Cup qualification hopes after a poor start in Group B.

AUS vs IND: Rohit Sharma tips Nitish Reddy to be an all-format great for IndiaRohit Sharma presented Nitish Reddy his ODI debut cap and praised his commitment. The all-rounder is tipped to become a key player across all formats for India.

Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma's lack of preparation for Australia questioned by KaifFormer cricketer Mohammed Kaif questioned both Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma's preparation for the Australia tour, asking why both stars didn't arrive down under a few days earlier. Kohli and Rohit flopped in the first ODI against the Aussies in Perth.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
